name: League Unstoppable
description:
Welcome to the notorious, the infamous, the never-ending:

Grab yourself three hyperactive dudes, drop them on a field, and try to make them put a ball in a goal.

Made in 72 Hours for the Mini Jam 86. The theme was "Sports" with the limitation "No stopping", open to our interpretation.

This is a local 1v1 game; sadly I was rather ill for half of the jam and couldn't get a computer opponent going in time. Nor a good win condition, for that matter. Might add that stuff in a few days though.

The Linux build works on a recent Arch Linux, I can't guarantee any further portability : / It only depends on X11 and GLFW though.

Known bugs: Text is a bit off under Windows because Raylib does not measure it properly.
